game.name: Ascendancy
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능
game.shortDescription: Watch a hundred AI-controlled characters, each with randomized stats, drop into a chaotic, obstacle-filled arena in an intense simulation. Scavenge weapons, armor, and loot scattered across the map while observing thrilling battles unfold in real time. only one can remains.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Watch a hundred AI-controlled characters, each with randomized stats, drop into a chaotic, obstacle-filled arena in an intense simulation. Scavenge weapons, armor, and loot scattered across the map while observing thrilling battles unfold in real time. only one can remains.
